mapper.select: SELECT seq, member_seq, inform_title, inform_content, inform_link, confirm_at, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm, confirm_dttm FROM t_member_inform WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_member_inform (member_seq, inform_title, inform_content, inform_link, confirm_at, chk_at, del_at, ins_dttm, confirm_dttm) VALUES (#{member_seq}, #{inform_title}, #{inform_content}, #{inform_link}, #{confirm_at}, #{chk_at}, #{del_at}, now(), #{confirm_dttm})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_member_inform SET member_seq = #{memberSeq}, inform_title = #{informTitle}, inform_content = #{informContent}, inform_link = #{informLink}, confirm_at = #{confirmAt}, chk_at = #{chkAt}, del_at = #{delAt}, confirm_dttm = #{confirmDttm} WHERE seq = #{seq}
